answers.author: Municipal Meerkat
answers.text:
Hello Randy!  I did some digging and came up with an RFP that may help you develop one of your own.  Attached is an RFP for a restaurant at a golf course in the City of Port St. Lucie, FL.  Let me know if this helps!

author: Randy Smith
text: We are looking for sample RFP's for a Food & Beverage vendor at our municipal golf course. This could be for a snack bar or a small restaurant. Specifically, we are designing a new clubhouse with an area for a kitchen. The function of the kitchen has not been determined but can be expanded depnding on that scope. Right now it is described as a snack bar with seating for 60 but there is some community interest for a restaurant. We want to see what the interest is from food vendors in operating this space. Thank you.
title: RFP For Food & Beverage Concessionaire
